snippet: Efan al-Essawi, a member of Parliament and a leader of the Awakening movement in Anbar Province, had survived many previous assassination attempts.
abstract: Iraqi Parliament member Efan al-Essawi is killed in suicide bomb attack in Anbar Province; Essawi, who was also leader of local council of Awakening movement, American-backed group of Sunni militias that switched sides to fight against Al Qaeda in Iraq, had escaped several previous assassination attempts.

byline.contributor: Christine Hauser contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Efan al-Essawi, a member of Parliament and a leader of the Awakening movement in Anbar Province, had survived many previous assassination attempts.

headline.seo: Efan al-Essawi, Iraqi Lawmaker and Sunni Leader, Killed in Bombing
headline.main: Sunni Lawmaker in Iraq Is Killed in a Suicide Bombing
headline.print_headline: Sunni Lawmaker in Iraq Is Killed in a Suicide Bombing
